amendment.description: To establish additional annual reporting requirements on activities under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978.

vote.text: Amendment SA 536 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 536 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S5913-5914; text: CR S5913-5914) To establish additional annual reporting requirements on activities under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 536 proposed by Senator Feingold.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 536 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
